  • Uses of Guest in Controllers

    Methods in Controllers with parameters of type Guest
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    AuctionController.BidUp(ModalAuction ModAuc, javafx.scene.control.TextField bid, javafx.scene.control.Alert walErr, Guest guest, Collection item, javafx.scene.control.Label lastBid, javafx.scene.control.TextArea output, javafx.scene.control.Alert bidErr)
    Bids up current item's price Firstly, checks if input is number, then if guest can afford buying this item with such price, if everything goes ok, bids price up and stores data about bid in file of the auction
    static void
    ManageItem.DeleteReg(Collection item, Guest guest)
    Deletes item from guest's registered auctions list after auction, or after the moment guest missed the auction deleting is completed by rewriting the file without certain auction(line)
    static void
    GuestMenuController.myAuc(javafx.scene.layout.FlowPane items, javafx.scene.control.Label wallet, Guest guest)
    opens window with registered auctions for guest and after window closes it checks for the changes in items list if there are some changes it will delete auction that has been sold or auction that some admin has added moment ago
    static void
    AuctionController.StartTimers(ModalAuction Auc, Guest guest, Collection item, javafx.scene.control.Label AucTime, javafx.scene.control.Label BidTime, javafx.scene.control.TextArea output, javafx.scene.control.Button BidUp, javafx.scene.control.Label lastBid)
    * Setting up two timers: 10 minutes and 10 seconds, timer for 10 minutes starts instantly, timer for 10 seconds will be started with the first bid up if any guest does not bid up in 2 minutes from the beginning, auction ends after every bid up that is noticed timer fo 10 seconds restartes when timers are over, system will delete item from available auctions, registered auction list of every participant, and will put it in the list of bought items of the winner if there are no winner(only possible when nobody has made a bid up) the item will be removed from registered list of participants, but will remain in the list of available auctions
    static void
    ManageItem.StoreBought(Guest guest, Collection item)
    Writes item to the file with guest's bought items
    static void
    ManageItem.StoreReg(Guest guest, Collection item)
    Writes item to the file with guest's registered auctions
    static void
    GuestMenuController.topUp(Guest guest, int sum, javafx.scene.control.Label wallet)
    tops up guest's wallet on amount of input
    static void
    GuestMenuController.UpdateWal(Guest guest)
    Rewrites file with Guests and corrects the wallet
    static void
    RegisterAucController.yes(Guest guest, Collection item, javafx.scene.control.Alert AlReg, javafx.scene.control.Alert NoMon, javafx.scene.control.Alert AlB, javafx.stage.Stage Reg)
    if button yes was pressed, that means that we need to check if we can register guest for the auction and then register him Method will start checking with the list of registered auctions for guest, if there is already such auction, there will appear error Then method checks wallet of the guest, if there is less ehtn 110% of the price, guest will not be registered Afterwards, method calsculates timer until the aucion, if timer is less or equals zero, auction will not be registered Registered auction is stored in file for certain guest.
